📏 Size Guide

Find your perfect fit with our comprehensive size guide. Accurate measurements and sizing information to ensure the best shopping experience.

Tops & Shirts

Our tops and shirts are designed for a comfortable, flattering fit. All measurements are in inches and represent the garment measurements, not body measurements.

💡 Sizing Tips

  • Chest measurement is the most important for tops
  • Consider the fit preference (slim, regular, relaxed)
  • Check the fabric content for stretch and drape
  • When in doubt, size up for a more comfortable fit

Size Chart - Tops & Shirts

Size Chest (inches) Waist (inches) Sleeve Length (inches) Shoulder Width (inches)
XS 34-36 28-30 32-33 16-17
S 36-38 30-32 33-34 17-18
M 38-40 32-34 34-35 18-19
L 40-42 34-36 35-36 19-20
XL 42-44 36-38 36-37 20-21
XXL 44-46 38-40 37-38 21-22

👕 Tops & T-Shirts

Standard sizing with comfortable fit. Our cotton blends provide excellent stretch and recovery. For athletic fits, consider sizing up.

👔 Dress Shirts

Formal wear with traditional sizing. Designed for a tailored fit with room for movement. Check collar size for proper fit.

🧥 Outerwear

Layering pieces with relaxed fit. Size up if you plan to wear heavy layers underneath. Check shoulder and sleeve measurements.

👖 Bottoms & Pants

Standard inseam lengths with comfortable waistbands. Consider rise preference (low, mid, high) when selecting size.

👗 Dresses

Flattering fits with stretch fabrics. Bust and hip measurements are most important. Check length preferences on product pages.

How to Measure Yourself

Accurate measurements ensure the perfect fit. Follow our step-by-step guide for the best results.
